body:
Hey everyone, I just uploaded my very first Nexus gameplay video with commentary!
Enjoy!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h-V_QJmRmjE

title: First Nexus Video!

replies.body: Sweet! Let's look for a 1v1 ...Oh a 4v1 hahhahahaha

replies.body: Thanks, I'm much better now, although I'm still coughing every now and then.
replies.body_tagged: Thanks, I'm much better now, although I'm still coughing every now and then.

replies.body: Noice. But just a question. Why do you block hit in every single fight? Wouldn't it be easier and more interesting to strafe. But it's your choice :). Keep it up Porkeh
replies.body_tagged: Noice. But just a question. Why do you block hit in every single fight? Wouldn't it be easier and more interesting to strafe. But it's your choice :). Keep it up Porkeh

replies.body:
Yea I sometimes strafe hit but I haven't been playing minecraft for a little while and I was just sort of lazy so I just went for the block hits.
This isn't how I normally PvP.
Give it a week or two and I'll do a video where I do 1v1's with friends :D
